name: Christmas Panic
description:
Christmas Panic is a Christmas, trash arena shooter where you have to face alone, a crowd of elf slaves working in a factory for the production of sex toys.

As weapons, firecrackers, firecrackers, confetti and other pyrotechnics are used.
Defeat all the enemies on the level, take the key and move on, the further the more difficult the enemies are and they are better armed.

You play as an elf who is tired of being a slave and wants to break out of the shackles of an oppressive system, tearing off his stupid hat, he took up arms. But stupid fellow elves prevent him from escaping.
